name: Profiler
description:
[ Submission for the GMTK Game Jam 2021 - theme was Joined Together ]

You are a profiler and your job is to join different suspect pictures together to get the target profile picture.

The game gets harder each level, with more variations and more suspects.

Controls: mouse

To reset the level, press R
(also useful if you don't find the solution and want a fresh batch of suspects)

Have fun and leave a comment if you enjoyed it!

Thanks

---

Created with Godot 3.3.2, Aseprite, Krita, Github and Spotify

Art and code are all created by me, Oskar van Velden
